TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {218838=Sobha is in the Construction & Contracting - Real Estate sector. The current market capitalisation stands at Rs 3,206.69 crore. The company management includes Ravi PNC Menon - Chairman, J C Sharma - Vice Chairman & Mng.Director, P Ramakrishnan - Deputy Managing Director, Punita Kumar Sinha - Independent Director, M Damodaran - Independent Director, S K Gupta - Independent Director, Anup Shah - Independent Director, R V S Rao - Independent Director. It is listed on the BSE with a BSE Code of 532784 and the NSE with an NSE Code of SOBHA.
